question: Which among the following is a correct function of Public Accounts Committee?
option1: It works under President of India and creates accounts for various ministries
option2: It works under Comptroller and Auditor General of India and prepares accounts
option3: It is a parliamentary committee which gives report on nonplan expenditures of the government
option4: It is a parliamentary committee which scrutinizes the report of the Comptroller & Auditor General of India
answer: It is a parliamentary committee which scrutinizes the report of the Comptroller & Auditor General of India
explanation: Public Accounts Committee examines the annual audit reports of the Comptroller and Auditor General of India (CAG), which are laid before the Parliament by the President.
